entry.title: Wednesday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 3. POP 30%
entry.summary: A few clouds. Increasing cloudiness after midnight then 30 percent chance of flurries before morning. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 3. Wind chill near minus 7. Forecast issued 6:46 PM EDT Wednesday 15 March 2023

entry.title: Thursday: Flurries. High 6.
entry.summary: Cloudy. 30 percent chance of flurries early in the morning. A few flurries beginning in the morning. Local snowfall amount 2 cm. Wind up to 15 km/h. High 6. Wind chill minus 5 in the morning. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 6:46 PM EDT Wednesday 15 March 2023

entry.title: Thursday night: Chance of flurries or rain showers. Low minus 2. POP 40%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy with 40 percent chance of flurries or rain showers in the evening and after midnight. Snow beginning after midnight. Snowfall amount 2 cm. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 2. Wind chill minus 4 overnight. Forecast issued 6:46 PM EDT Wednesday 15 March 2023
